title: Testing… testing
author: VD
content_html:
CoComment reports that the truncating comment bug is fixed and deployed. They would like you to test it out, so if you’re feeling repressed, this would be the thread on which you may express yourself to the full. And by full, I mean length, not the full extent of your vulgar vocabulary.

Oh Sweet Sparta! I just realized what this means. WLW is unchained and we still have 9/10ths of Thucydides left!
content_text:
CoComment reports that the truncating comment bug is fixed and deployed.  They would like you to test it out, so if you’re feeling repressed, this would be the thread on which you may express yourself to the full.  And by full, I mean length, not the full extent of your vulgar vocabulary.
Oh Sweet Sparta!  I just realized what this means.  WLW is unchained and we still have 9/10ths of Thucydides left!
